title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Grand Rapids, Michigan
content:
Photo submitted by Brian Davis, “Grand Rapids, MI, is a bike and beer haven. You can ride urban city streets, heavily wooded mature forests, find some challenging climbs and descents, and hit 10 breweries along the way all in a 30 mile ride! This shot is from Robinette’s Trail.” (Trail is closed during harvest season

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Grand Rapids, Michigan appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
